description:
Fix RTL for the local popup by setting the alignment to match the Chromium display language.


BUG=222289


Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=189587

messages.text: Hi Dan - would you be able to review this small change?

https://codereview.chromium.org/12806005/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js
File chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12806005/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js#newcode96
chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js:96: suggestionDiv.dir = getApiObjectHandle().rtl ? 'rtl' : 'ltr';
is this not being inherited automatically?

https://codereview.chromium.org/12806005/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js#newcode248
chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js:248: '  text-align: ' + (isRtl ? 'right' : 'left') + ';' +
this should probably happen automatically, no?

https://codereview.chromium.org/12806005/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js#newcode250
chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js:250: '  margin-right: ' + (isRtl ? startMargin : 'auto') + ';' +
-webkit-margin-start: startMargin

> is this not being inherited automatically?
Now it is (moved dir to the container).

https://codereview.chromium.org/12806005/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js#newcode248
chrome/browser/resources/local_omnibox_popup/local_omnibox_popup.js:248: '  text-align: ' + (isRtl ? 'right' : 'left') + ';' +
Removed.

Done.

lgtm
